All links in the corpus, keeping original url only. 
Estimated coordination interval: 39 seconds
```{r}
df <- read_csv("test_coor_interval.csv")
df_updated <- as_tibble()
df$date = ymd(df$date)

ct_shares.df <- get_ctshares(df, 
                             platforms = "facebook",
                             sleep_time = 15, 
                             clean_urls = TRUE)

estimate_coord_interval(ct_shares.df)
output <- get_coord_shares(ct_shares.df, clean_urls = TRUE, keep_ourl_only = TRUE)
get_outputs(output)


ct_shares_marked.df<- apply(ct_shares_marked.df,2,as.character)
write.csv(ct_shares_marked.df, file = 'ct_shares_marked.csv')
```
